Stars: Selim Boughedir, Mustapha Adouani, Rabia Ben Abdallah
Storyline
A coming-of-age comedy/drama set in Tunisia. Twelve-year-old Noura is an impressionable boy who must learn to reconcile two conflicting worlds - the loving world of Muslim women and the vastly different, harsher world of men - while also dealing with his own budding sexuality. Written by Dawn M. Barclift
